column5: which or covers red river / winnipeg river the best?

Hop on the Navionics Web App to preview the mapping zoom in and click on the Sonar Icon for the High def sonar chart layer. What sonar do you have? Want to make sure its compatible with Nav+ Web App link http://webapp.navionics.com/?lang=en#@6&key=ssooGzmbxP What ever is on the web app will be available on a Navionics map card. Do you own a Navionics map card now? Nav Updates might work for you.
thanks for the info. i have 2 naviocs cards. i will contact them and see what they say
You can look at this video:https://youtu.be/HrZ8puc9xdQ And this link:http://www.navionics.com/en/navionics-updates
Navionics Gold SE Alaska/Canada or Navionics+ are your 2 choices.
